name: WoW Merge
description:
WoW Merge is a wonderful and addictive number game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain.

TAP the number to PLUS 1 to it. When at least 3 identical numbers are lined up, they are MERGED into a larger number.

Use your brain to challenge of reaching bigger numbers!

Features:
● Super addictive number gameplay!
● Make the Combo to get higher score
● No Time limite. Plan before you move!
● Use the Hammer Tool to clear selected card
● Use the Number Tool to plus 2 or minus 1 for one card

Download this new number merge game to enjoy the endless fun!
